name: Daniel Rey Cimafranca
text: Hahahahaha reminds mo of an incident. I almost got ran over while crossing street because car that passed.suddenly backed up. Makikipag away pala sa barker, ewan ko kung bakit. Naglabas ng baril galing sa pouch. Bwisit naramdaman ko pero dedma na lang, I went in 7-11 to buy a drink. Paglabas ko nandun pa rin still making a scene surrounded by usis. I mean cmon, angry guy with a gun and your still hanging around to watch? Only in the Philippines. I couldnt take anymore the absurdity of it all. Nilapitan ko sila at sabi ko, "kunin nyo kaya ang plaka." Ayun natauhan si mayabang, harurot sa pagalis.
